long_description: Can't live without your coffee? Keep a fresh-brewed batch hot for up to 12 hrs. with this rugged Stanley vacuum bottle. Stainless-steel, BPA-free construction stands up to rough days on the trail and at the work site; interior has no liners or coatings. Vacuum insulation keeps beverages hot for 12 hrs. or cold for 15 hrs. Insulated lid doubles as an 8 fl. oz. drinking cup. Leakproof stopper locks liquids inside; twist the stopper open and pour from any angle to fill up your cup. Stanley vacuum bottle holds up to 16 fl. oz. (0.47 liter).
short_description: Can't live without your coffee? Keep a fresh-brewed batch hot for up to 12 hrs. with this rugged Stanley vacuum bottle.
